message: simulate multivariate *correlated* data: http://www.cerebralmastication.com/2010/08/even-simpler-multivariate-correlated-simulations/ -- really simple, just use mvrnorm function from the MASS package.

this article uses R to simply illustrate the difference between Ordinary Least Squares OLS and Principal Component Analysis PCA: http://www.cerebralmastication.com/2010/09/principal-component-analysis-pca-vs-ordinary-least-squares-ols-a-visual-explination/
POWER LAW distributions in empirical data, to fit check out this R code: http://www.santafe.edu/~aaronc/powerlaws
Jan de Leeuw :: Multiple Correspondence Analysis MCA as a form of Nonlinear Principal Component Analysis NLPCA http://ff.im/OmWHS
